posts.message:
My friends and fellows,

We will be kicking off the first Facebook Developers Circle Cairo meetup next January. If you would like to be notified by the time, agenda and the updates; You're more than welcomed to join this group made specifically for Cairo. It's gonna be huge and you don't want to miss it :) We're talking about speakers coming from Facebook to Cairo to celebrate the first meetup for our Circle! If you or someone you know might be interested in speaking or sharing your experiences, please post to the Developer Circle Facebook group!

https://www.facebook.com/groups/DevC.Cairo/

Does anybody know companies here in Cairo which has products built upon a good model of Microservices architecture and are concerned with event buses, docker, build and deployment automation, Cloud-Based (AWS or GCP), unit and automated integration tests, multi tenancy?

Please if you know any state company names, product/business domain and technology stack they use.

Thanks in advance

posts.message:
Please , I need a place that offers a CEH(certified ethical hacking) course from scratch and not the courses that prepare for the CEH exam 
Note: I know a lot of programming languages but I want a course that starts from scratch.

Did anyone know that the hyphen-spearated-case is called "kebab case" ? LOL I just read that on the list of the methods provided by this library https://vocajs.com/#kebabCase and found that reference on Wikipedia.

posts.message:
دلوقت انا بقالي اجازه فتره في مصر و كنت بفكر فعليا اشوف شغل هنا. المشكله اني مش لاقي اي data حقيقية بتوضح متوسط المرتبات في مصر للناس اللي في خبرتي (١٣ سنه تقريبا)
يعني في شركه زي ميكروسوفت. سألت مدير هناك و كان متوسط المرتبات بعد الضرائب في حدود ٣٠-٣٥ الف. بس في نفس الوقت لما بصيت علي شركه زي ITWORX مثلا علي Glassdoor كان المتوسط ٩-١٠ آلاف و مش مكتوب حتي ان كان ده قبل ولا بعد الضرائب
حد عنده ارقام فعليه؟ مش عايز أضيع وقتي و وقت الشركات علشان في الاخر اكتشف الأرقام العجيبة ديه

صباخ الخير , 
انا عندي انترفيو مع فودافون مصر ( مهندس برمجيات ) . لو حد مر بالتجربه ياريت ينصحني ولو فيه نصايح لازاي استعد واقدر احسن مستوايا وهبقى شاكر جدا :)

Facebook new video widget, 
Vey good UX, 
Poor UI, and shit testing, i can't even close it !
